segments.text: Walker Airline Travel Agency.May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What flight has seats available to Milan on this Sunday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry . All the seats are booked . How about next Monday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh.my god . But I have to be there on Sunday . I want to go on stand-by .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , sir . I have added your name to the waiting list.We will call you as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S1
